overview: Scott is a very rich businessman who hangs out with a snooty, silly Countess, but has the hots for Kay who is already engaged to Bill. Scott pursues Kay like crazy, going so far as to buy Bill's oil company so that he can banish him to Japan,  leaving Kay unmoored.
tagline: It was love at first FIGHT!... So they married in HATE and lived SCRAPPILT ever after!
title: Love Before Breakfast
